name: idbpaging
description: Pagination based on the indexeddb module idbx

scripts.bundleDts: echo "$(grep -o '".*"' dest/types/mod.d.ts | sed 's/"//g' | xargs -I{} cat dest/types/{})" > dest/idbpaging.d.ts
scripts.dts: npm run ts-types && npm run replaceDts && npm run bundleDts && npm run unimportDts && rimraf dest/types
scripts.build: rimraf dest && node ./esbuild.js && npm run dts
